description: Returns the access policy document that is associated with the named backup vault.

parameters.name: BackupVaultName
parameters.description: The name of a logical container where backups are stored. Backup vaults are identified by names that are unique to the account used to create them and the Amazon Web Services Region where they are created.

nested_items.name: BackupVaultName
nested_items.description: The name of a logical container where backups are stored. Backup vaults are identified by names that are unique to the account used to create them and the Region where they are created.

nested_items.name: BackupVaultArn
nested_items.description: An Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that uniquely identifies a backup vault; for example, arn:aws:backup:us-east-1:123456789012:backup-vault:aBackupVault.

nested_items.name: Policy
nested_items.description: The backup vault access policy document in JSON format.
